Test Name: Spotted Fever Group Antibody, IgG and IgM
Purpose: To quantify IgG and IgM antibodies against Spotted Fever Group Rickettsia in serum to aid in the diagnosis of Spotted Fever Rickettsiosis.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., red-top or serum separator tube, no anticoagulant)
Equipment: ELISA kit specific for Spotted Fever Group antibodies and a microplate reader (450 nm)
